Name: ATLAS RAVEN H311 V1 Motherboard with DDR4, M.2 for Intel 6th-9th Gen
Description: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with Intel 6th to 9th Gen processors. Fast Memory Performance - Dual-channel DDR4 up to 32GB, speeds reaching 2666MHz. Flexible Storage Options - Supports 4 SATA III ports and 1 M.2 slot. High-Speed Connectivity - Equipped with USB 3.0, HDMI, Gigabit LAN for fast connections. Enhanced Audio System - Realtek ALC892 chipset delivers immersive 5.1-channel HD sound.

Flexible Storage Options - Supports 4 SATA III ports and 1 M.2 slot
High-Speed Connectivity - Equipped with USB 3.0, HDMI, Gigabit LAN for fast connections
Enhanced Audio System - Realtek ALC892 chipset delivers immersive 5.1-channel HD sound

Name: ATLAS RAVEN B450M Frost - Micro-ATX AM4 Motherboard with Ryzen 1000-5600 Support
Description: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with AMD Ryzen 1st-5th Gen processors on the AM4 socket. High-Speed Memory - Dual DDR4 slots supporting up to 32 GB and 3200 MHz (OC). Flexible Storage Options - 4 x SATA III ports plus 1 x M.2 slot for SATA & NVMe SSDs. Integrated Display Outputs - HDMI and VGA ports for CPUs with Radeon Graphics. Reliable Connectivity - Gigabit LAN, multiple USB 3.0/2.0 ports, and HD audio.

Name: ATLAS RAVEN H61 V3 Motherboard with DDR3, HDMI & M.2 NVMe Slot
Description: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with Intel 2nd & 3rd Gen Core i7/i5/i3, Pentium, and Celeron processors (up to 95W TDP). Efficient Memory Performance - Supports up to 16 GB DDR3 RAM with speeds up to 1600 MHz. Graphics Ready - HDMI and VGA outputs powered by integrated Intel HD Graphics. Flexible Storage Options - 4x SATA II ports plus an M.2 NVMe slot (2242 SSD). Stable & Durable Design - Solid capacitors and reinforced PCB ensure reliable long-term performance.

Name: ATLAS 22" HD LED Monitor 16:10 Aspect Ratio, VGA & HDMI Input
Description: High Definition Display - 22-inch screen with 1680 x 1050 resolution and a 16:10 aspect ratio for clear and sharp visuals. Fast Response Time - 5ms response time for smooth performance, ideal for gaming and multimedia. LED Backlight Technology - Energy-efficient LED backlight for bright, vibrant images while reducing power consumption. Versatile Connectivity - Multiple input options, including VGA, HDMI, and DC power port, ensuring compatibility with various devices. VESA Mount Compatibility - Supports VESA mounting, offering flexible installation options for a clean and adjustable setup.
